sentences.en: Be ready to betoken the Jesus blessing in everyone!
sentences.cn: 愿主耶稣赐福于每个人!

sentences.en: Betoken : To be or give a sign or portent of.
sentences.cn: 预示: 做或给出记号或预兆.

sentences.en: Coal seventeen is a tier betoken a coal mining in DongRong two Coalmine.
sentences.cn: 东荣二矿十七号煤是主采煤层.
乌云予示着暴风雨的来临.

sentences.en: He gave her a gift to betoken his gratitude.
sentences.cn: 他送她一件礼物表示感谢.

sentences.en: That would only betoken for us seven years of plenty and seven years of scarcity.
sentences.cn: 那只是预示我们将有七年丰收和七年饥荒.

sentences.en: The president alone betokened the national identity.
sentences.cn: 总统一人就代表了国家形象。

sentences.en: Those black clouds betoken a storm.
sentences.cn: 那些黑云预示着暴风雨即将来临.

trans.tran_en: to be a sign of something
